attributes.additional_details: It's becoming more apparent that the cure is now much worse than the virus itself. We must put a stop to this human suffering now. There needs to be a fair debate in parliament about the major decline of people's livelihoods due to repeated lockdowns and why they must end permanently as the UK fear this may become the 'new normal'.
attributes.background: The UK simply can't go on like this. Businesses are going under, mental health is through the roof, thousands of excess deaths are occurring due to been unable to access sufficient health care, children missing out on months worth of education. The list goes on.
